overview:
Marketing enterpreneur , SEO expert and founder of several websites such as:

Hotel Last Minute Deals

SEO Consultant

newhotels4u

And several others.

More than 12 years experience and a succesful background in SEO and Marketing online in Spain and the UK, Jose Truchado moved to London in March 2008 to work for ToTalStay Group as Head of Marketing and SEO, to later work for Expedia Affiliate Network as it’s Head of SEO ExpediaAffiliate.com.

Jose Truchado is one of the founding members of Destinia.com one of the most successful online travel agencies in Spain.
